generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and arrows, extending into the distance, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: A paved area alongside the road, bordered by a curb and greenery, is visible on the right side, which is a sidewalk.
- building: Several multi-story buildings with windows and architectural details are visible along the left side of the road and in the background.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the road, and a hedge is present on the right side, bordering the sidewalk.
- terrain: Grass and some soil are visible in the areas between the sidewalk and the road, and along the edges of the pavement.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing as a light blue with some clouds.
- person: A man wearing a cap and a dark shirt is riding a bicycle on the road, which qualifies as a person.
- rider: The man on the bicycle is a rider, as he is operating a bicycle.
- car: Several cars are parked along the side of the road, and one car is visible further down the road.
- pole: A tall, thin pole with a sign attached is visible near the center of the image, which is a pole.
- traffic sign: A rectangular traffic sign is mounted on a pole near the center of the image, which is a traffic sign.
- bicycle: A bicycle is being ridden by the person on the road, which qualifies as a bicycle.
